Text: So, if I put the ISO on a disk and put it in my Wii, it will run? I guess I just extract the ISO with WinRAR and then copy the files onto it?

That's not how it works. You need to mod your wii then burn the iso image to a dvd. 
OR
You could use a homebrow app called "uLoader" to load games through a flash drive inserted into the wii(saves you dvds)
